term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
No Government No Pay Act of 2015
A Member of Congress may not receive pay, during a government shutdown, equal to the product of the Member's daily rate of pay and the number of 24-hour periods during which the government shutdown is in effect. This prohibition shall apply on and after the convening of the 115th Congress.
